plot outline: Devaki is a single parent living in Kolkata, who is raising her daughter Aaradhya. One evening, Aaradhya goes missing after she goes for auditions at a radio station. Devaki, helpless, sets out to find her, while stumbling upon some horrific sights and truths about child trafficking in Kolkata.
title: Devaki
plot: _Devaki_ (qv) a single parent, is frantically in search of her 10-year-old daughter Aaradhya on the dingy streets of Kolkata.

_Devaki_ (qv) is a single parent living in Kolkata, who is raising her daughter Aaradhya. One evening, Aaradhya goes missing after she goes for auditions at a radio station. _Devaki_ (qv), helpless, sets out to find her, while stumbling upon some horrific sights and truths about child trafficking in Kolkata.::Sunayana Suresh
